item.title: ESRB rates unannounced Konami game Enchanted Wonderland for Switch
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

Explore a magic world to gather joy and resurrect a theme park.

The Entertainment Software Rating Board has rated Enchanted Wonderland, an unannounced adventure game for Switch published by Konami.

The rating provides the following summary:

Enchanted Wonderland is rated E for Everyone by the ESRB with Mild Fantasy Violence. Also includes Users Interact. This is an adventure game in which players explore a magical world to gather joy and resurrect a theme park. Players interact with characters, learn magic, and engage in different theme park attractions / mini games. Among the several mini-games, one space-themed attraction involves shooting lasers at UFOs; flashing and small explosions my occur when space ships are hit.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/esrb-rates-unannounced-konami-game-enchanted-wonderland-for-switch
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar rated for PS5, Xbox Series in Taiwan
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for Switch 2, Switch, and PC.

The Taiwan Digital Game Rating Committee has rated PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions of Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar.

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar first launched for Switch 2, Switch, and PC via Steam on August 27. Marvelous has yet to officially announce PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions.

Here is an overview of the game, via Marvelous:

About

Tired of the hustle and bustle of the city, and looking for a life of cozy comforts? Have a green thumb, a love for animals, and a desire for a breath of fresh mountain air? Consider making Zephyr Town your new home!

Our delightful location offers invigorating year-round winds and boasts a world-famous marketâ€¦which admittedly has fallen on hard times. Weâ€™re looking for a motivated individual to help us bring brighter days back to our breezy burg! Weâ€™ll even provide you with a farm to help bring local goods to wanting customers and show the world that Zephyr Townâ€™s bazaar can still fly high.

Please contact Mayor Felix to make an appointment to visit today! Serious inquiries only.

Zephyr Townâ€™s bazaar was once one of the grandest in the world, drawing customers and peddlers from all four corners of the globe. These days, though, the bazaar has more tumbleweeds than customers. Itâ€™s up to you to turn its fortunes around! Raise animals, harvest crops, craft rare delicacies, then sell your wares at your very own stall in the bazaar. As the bazaar business grows, new goods and services will arrive, which you can use to improve your farm. Help return prosperity to the bazaar, and Zephyr Town will thrive once again!

Inspired by the classic handheld title, the new Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar builds up and improves on the original in every conceivable way. The world is bigger and more alive than ever thanks to incredible new visuals, new characters, expanded story, and full character voice work in story eventsâ€”a series first. Take advantage of Zephyr Townâ€™s unique weather, using the wind to make travel and farm tasks a breeze! The winds of change are coming to deliver your new life in Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar.

Key Features

  • Cozy Living Reaches New Heights â€“ The magnificent beauty of Zephyr Town shines with gorgeous graphics while a richly voiced story carries the player on a rewarding journey of farming, friendship, and renewal.
  • Ring the Bell and Sell, Sell, Sell â€“ Your farmâ€™s produce and goods take on additional importance as the heart of your business at the lively weekly bazaar. Customize your stall and take charge of your sales to build up buzz and power up profits.
  • Take the Leap â€“ Harness the power of the wind! Use windmills to create new products to sell, and effortlessly travel across the town on your glider. Use new jumping skills on your farm, or when exploring the town. You never know what youâ€™ll find!
  • A Beautifully Cozy Life â€“ Enjoy a rich life amongst a colorful community of characters, from friendly townsfolk to magical Nature Sprites. Build yourself a home, grow relationships, and even find love and start a family.


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/story-of-seasons-grand-bazaar-rated-for-ps5-xbox-series-in-taiwan

item.title: Games industry New Year 2026 cards and messages
item.content:encoded:
It is 2026 in several parts of the world, and game publishers, developers, and creators have begun to share their New Year greeting cards.

Get the full roundup below. (Updated regularly.)

(Note: Content may take some time to load due to the amount of embedded tweets.)

Aniplex

COSEN

(PlayStation versions of The Alchemist of Ars Magna, Forward to the Sky, and The Fox Awaits Me HANA are in development. Key visuals for the former two titles will be released around spring.)

FluidFury Interactive

Idea Factory

Compile Heart
